name: Plunder
description: Streamers are pitted against their viewers. Streamers sail to various locations in search of gold to plunder. As the viewers watch, the streamer raids the locations and the viewers choose to aid in the defense. With cannons, spells, and teamwork, the viewers can fend off the streamer's attack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer. Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better. Storage: 2 GB available space
